short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change color of vote buttons on old and new reddit for archived posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that changes color and skew of upvote and downvote buttons on old and new reddit when a post is archived to make it obvious that it is archived.
